Description: Wedge fill colors
Places wedges in a counter-clockwise fashion
Hex color string for the edge of the pie wedges
Line style for the wedge edge lines {‘-’, ‘--’, ‘-.’, ‘:’}
Width of the wedge edge lines in pixels
Emphasize one or more wedges by offsetting it from the center of the pie by some amount
Font color for the wedge labels
Font size for the wedge labels
Font weight for the wedge labels {'light', 'normal', 'medium', 'semibold', 'bold', 'heavy', 'black'}
Transparency value for the bars between 0-1
Distance from the center of the pie to the inner edge; used to make donut plots
Distance from the center of the pie to the category labels
Label each pie wedge with the percentage for that category
Distance from center [0] to edge [pie_radius] at which percentage labels are placed
Font color for the percentage labels
Font size for the percentage labels
Font weight for the percentage labels {'light', 'normal', 'medium', 'semibold', 'bold', 'heavy', 'black'}
Sets the radius of the pie chart
Rotate the pie labels to align with the bisection line from center of the pie through the wedge
Add a shadow to give a 3D appearance to the pie chart
The angle at which the first wedge starts with [3 o'clock = 0; 12 o'clock =90; etc]
